name: Krzosek W Krainie Czarów
storyline: A fascinating role-playing game set in the village of Żabieniec. Korzon and his dog, Krzosek, have to face adversity and return home. To have equipment, you will have to either fight for it or buy it. Explore the open world and admire original graphics. Lots of weapons and armor, Easter eggs and much more on February 6, 2021.
